s.text: Bell had recently been approved to have the federal government subsidize part of his monthly rent, but the government's portion of the December rent was going to be delayed until January, and the landlord was reluctant to wait.
Liebler explained the situation in court and the landlord, who had already received Bell's portion of the December rent, agreed to wait for the government's portion. "
The landlord was claiming Stimpson owed $2,750 in back rent, but Stimpson told Liebler she was planning to move out anyway because of the poor condition of her West Belden Avenue residence.
Carols are playing just about everywhere as shoppers hit stores for their annual holiday gift-buying.
Seventeen evictions were delayed, giving families additional time to find new housing, Romeo said.
